pages.title: ℧ Two of Cups ℧
pages.text: Spirit of Love$(br)     ♀ Venus in ♋ Cancer

Two youths are pledging to one another, and above their cups rises the mythical caduceus, between the great wings of which there appears a lion's head.$(br)  Love is that desire for union which is not in Nature, but by which Nature is sanctified.$(br)  The lion with wings atop the snakes is both a herald of transmutation and a chimera that warns us of the dangers of giving ourselves so totally to love.

Consciousness, self-awareness, critical thinking; these have less importance in a state of carnal and emotional bliss. $(br2)$(l)Divinatory meanings$()$(br)  People joining in love, sharing, a new relationship. Union, concord, sympathy.$(br)  Apart from romance, the card means feeling in perfect harmony with yourself and the world.
$(l)Reversed$()$(br)  Holding back from a relationship, separations.
